item.title: Megan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Be the change that you wish to see in the world." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Megan add a quote by Frank Zappa
item.description: "So many books, so little time." -- Frank Zappa

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Megan add a quote by Eleanor Roosevelt
item.description: "A woman is like a tea bag; you never know how strong it is until it's in hot water." -- Eleanor Roosevelt

item.title: Megan add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination. Imagination is more important than knowledge. Knowledge is limited. Imagination encircles the world." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "To be yourself in a world that is constantly trying to make you something else is the greatest accomplishment." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "Not all of us can do great things. But we can do small things with great love." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Megan add a quote by Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni
item.description: "However many holy words you read, however many you speak, what good will they do you if you do not act on upon them?" -- Buddha Siddhartha Guatama Shakyamuni

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Happiness is not something ready made. It comes from your own actions." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Megan add a quote by Gautama Buddha
item.description: "All that we are is the result of what we have thought: it is founded on our thoughts and made up of our thoughts. If a man speak or act with an evil thought, suffering follows him as the wheel follows the hoof of the beast that draws the wagon.... If a man speak or act with a good thought, happiness follows him like a shadow that never leaves him." -- Gautama Buddha

item.title: Megan add a quote by George Bernard Shaw
item.description: "You see things; you say, 'Why?' But I dream things that never were; and I say 'Why not?" -- George Bernard Shaw

item.title: Megan add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mother Teresa
item.description: "If you judge people, you have no time to love them." -- Mother Teresa

item.title: Megan add a quote by Elbert Hubbard
item.description: "A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you." -- Elbert Hubbard

item.title: Megan add a quote by A.A. Milne
Megan add a quote by Shel Silverstein
item.description: "Listen to the mustn'ts, child. Listen to the don'ts. Listen to the shouldn'ts, the impossibles, the won'ts. Listen to the never haves, then listen close to me... Anything can happen, child. Anything can be." -- Shel Silverstein

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "A person's a person, no matter how small." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Megan add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Happiness is when what you think, what you say, and what you do are in harmony." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "I am the Lorax. I speak for the trees. I speak for the trees for the trees have no tongues." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "The more that you read, the more things you will know. The more that you learn, the more places you'll go." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Megan add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is a warm puppy." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Megan add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn't hurt." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Megan add a quote by Charles Schulz
item.description: "Exercise is a dirty word. Every time I hear it I wash my mouth out with chocolate." -- Charles Schulz

item.title: Megan add a quote by Charles Schulz
item.description: "There are three things I have learned never to discuss with people... Religion, Politics, and The Great Pumpkin. " -- Charles Schulz

item.title: Megan add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Happiness is anyone and anything that's loved by you." -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Megan add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Never jump into a pile of leaves with a wet sucker." -- Charles M. Schulz
